monster.name: Rhinoceros

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 336, Tomb of Annihilation, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
